questions.name: ABC Corp requires that policyholders receive email indicating the status of their auto insurance claim as the claim processed. You create the work party for the policyholder as an instance of which class?

options.answer: The Data Explorer
The Clipboard tool
Live UI
The Tracer

questions.name: ABC Corp requires that policyholders receive email indicating the status of their auto insurance claim as the claim processed. You create the work party for the policyholder as an instance of which class?

options.answer: Data-Party-Operator
Data-Party-Com
Data-Party-Person
Data-Party-Org

questions.name: Adding instructions to a step ____________.

options.answer: Defines what the step should do.
Describes to an end user what should be done in the step.
Instructs an architect how to build the step.
Describes the business value of the step.

questions.name: An application change goes into effect on June 15, 2016. Due to this change, two fields are added to a user form to collect information for compliance purposes. Assuming that today is April 30, 2016, how should you configure circumstancing for the form?

options.answer: Circumstance the form by template and definition; in the definition, specify June 15, 2016, as the cut-off date.
Update the existing form to apply a circumstance; specify June 15, 2016, as the end date.
Circumstance the form by property and date; specify June 15, 2016, as the start date.
Circumstance the form by property and date; test that the creation date for the case is on or after June 15, 2016.

questions.name: An application includes the property .Employee.Dependents(2).DateOfBirth. The property mode of .Dependents(2) is a _________________. (Choose One)

options.answer: PageList
PageGroup
ValueList
ValueGroup:

questions.name: An application is organized as a hierarchy, the hierarchy is referred to as a ________________ and it governs how individual rules are ___________. (Choose One)

options.answer: application structure, used
class structure, applied
rules hierarchy, checked out
ruleset list, grouped

questions.name: An application lets customers book airline reservations online. What would you expect to be defined as the case type in the application?

options.answer: An airline ticket
A confirmation email
A reviewed reservation
A reservation

questions.name: An application references a data element found in the Work-class. How is this rule inherited by the application?

options.answer: By applying directed inheritance.
By naming PegaRULES as the built-on application.
By adding the ruleset that contains the property to the application.
By applying pattern inheritance.

questions.name: An application will use a data page to store user preferences. This page needs to be available to all the cases associated with a single end user. The most appropriate scope for this data page is _______________. (Choose One)

options.answer: Node
Requestor
Shared
Thread:

questions.name: The approval process for a purchase request case must satisfy the following requirements: - A request for office supplies placed by the Facilities department that totals EUR100 or less is automatically approved. - A request for software is automatically rejected unless requested by the IT department. - Any request that exceeds EUR1000 is automatically subject to review by the auditing department. Which type of rule would you configure to satisfy this requirement?

options.answer: Decision Tree
Map Value
Decision Table
When

questions.name: You are designing a case type that includes a process to perform when a case is rejecting. How do you model thisrequirement in the case life cycle?

options.answer: Add an alternate stage and add the rejection process as an optional process to the stage.
Add the rejection process to all the primary stages as an optional process.
Add a primary stage and add the rejection process to the stage.
Add an alternate stage and add the rejection process to the stage.

questions.name: Automating decisions based on business logic enables ___________________________.

options.answer: application users to mark a specific location for business exceptions that may arise in the process flow
architects to spend less time building the application
application users to focus on more nuanced decisions that require business expertise
architects to improve the performance of the application

questions.name: A business process requirement states that users should be able to modify the shipping address at any time and not interrupt the primary case. Which of the following options is the best way to design for this requirement?

options.answer: Add a local action to the case type.
Add a process in a stage.
Add an optional process to any stage in the case type.
Add a step in a process.

questions.name: A candidate's language skills are captured in a candidate case. What type of property is used to capture the candidate's language skill if the property reference looks like this: .Language(Spanish)?

options.answer: Value group
Text
Page
Single value

questions.name: The case type hierarchy in your insurance application consists of three case types: Claim (top level), Personal Injury (subcase type of Claim), and Emergency Care (subcase type of Personal Injury). In the Claim case type, a data transform sets the claim date and work urgency.To reduce maintenance, you do not want to set in each subcase the properties that were already set in the parent data transforms . However, you want to set work urgency to different values in each subcase type. What two configuration steps would you take to meet this requirement? (Choose Two)

options.answer: In each subcase type data transform, set the work urgency to the required value.
Select the Call superclass data transform option in each of the subcase type data transforms.
In the Claims data transform, for each subcase type, configure an Update Page action and set the work urgency value.
Select the Call superclass data transform option in the Claims data transform and clear the option in the Personal Injury and Emergency Care data transforms.

questions.name: A claim case records the items of loss. The property reference that describes an item of loss looks like this: .ItemOfLoss(1).Description. The property reference .ItemOfLoss(1) is an example of a __________ property?

options.answer: page list
single value
value list
Page:

questions.name: Classes are used to ______________________. (Choose Two)

options.answer: manage a set of rules that define a major portion of an application.
organize a set of rules for deployment to another server.
organize a set of rules into a hierarchy.
organize a set of rules for reusability.

questions.name: A company provides two applications to its employees. The first application is managed by the Accounting department, and allows employees to submit expense reports for reimbursement. The second application is managed by the IT department, and allows employees to submit support tickets for IT-related issues. Both applications require a data element to track the status of cases. Select the best strategy for implementing this requirement.

options.answer: Check the inheritance path to determine if an appropriate data element is already available.
Create a data element for each case type, because they may use different status values.
Create one data element in the org layer for both applications to use.
Create one data element in the class group layer for both applications to use.

questions.name: Conditional paths in a case life cycle are used to define ______________________. (Choose Two)

options.answer: subprocesses that run in the context of the current case
subprocesses that run in parallel with the context of the current case
paths in the case life cycle that are followed based on run-time values
paths in the case life cycle that are chosen by a user at run-time

questions.name: Consider a class named:ABC-FW-Global-USA-Expenses-Work-ReimbursementRequest Which class requires directed inheritance?

options.answer: None
All
ReimbursementRequest:
ABC

questions.name: Direct Capture of Objectives (DCO) provides many benefits. Which of the following are benefits of DCO? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Easily convert legacy operations to automated business processes.
Automatically define and store application requirements.
Provide real-time awareness of project development to all project participants.
Use working models to better facilitate business and IT collaboration.

questions.name: During a playback, you place a flow in draft mode to address which limitation?

options.answer: To save an incomplete flow.
To prevent additional shapes from being added to the flow.
To avoid errors due to references to rules that do not yet exist.
To allow users to choose decisions outcomes if a decision rule if not yet available.

questions.name: A dynamic layout uses an Inline format to organize UI elements on the screen. The Inline format is configured with two responsive breakpoints: the first one is to change to an Inline grid triple format at 1024 pixels, and the second one is to change to an Inline grid double format at 768 pixels. The UI elements are arranged into various numbers of rows depending on the screen size and number of elements on the screen. When the screen size is at 800 pixels and there are five elements on the screen, how many elements should be in the last row? (Choose One)

options.answer: One since it is in Inline grid double format.
Undetermined â€” it depends on the sizes of the elements.
Two since it is in Inline grid triple format.
Five since it is in Inline format.

questions.name: An application allows bank customer to apply for a credit card. During the process of applying for the credit card,customers can elect to transfer a balance to the card.The bank currently offers three balance transfer options for customers applying for a new credit card:1. 0 percent interest for 6 months.2. 2.9 percent interest for 12 months.3. 3.9 percent interest for 24 months.The bank requires that customers first elect whether to transfer a balance. If customers elect to transfer a balance,they must select one of the three options.Which control allows you to display all the balance transfer offers on the form, but only allows the customer to selectone offer?

options.answer: Text area
Radio buttons
Picklist
Check box

questions.name: An expense report process requires the assignment for travel expenses to be routed to a specific auditor. The auditor is also a member of an auditing work group. How would you route the assignment so that the user receives it?

options.answer: To the user
To the user's work group
To the user`s manager
To the user`s work queue

questions.name: The External Database Table Class Mapping wizard creates a data class and a database table. How do you make this data available to your application?

options.answer: Use a static list
Use case data
Use a data page
Use local storage

questions.name: Given the following business requirement, "Once a loan application is complete the case is routed to a group of underwriters for review." What type of routing is needed to ensure the case is handled by the next available underwriter? (Choose One)

options.answer: Worklist routing
Work queue routing
Workpool routing
Get Next Work routing

questions.name: The goal milestone in a service level defines the amount of time _____________________.

options.answer: allowed for a user to advance a case to the next stage
in which the case or step must be completed
in which the case or step should be completed
allowed before an assignment is considered overdue.

questions.name: A home loan company has home appraisal offices in various regions. Each office has its own work queue. Company policy requires that home appraisals are assigned to offices based on the home's location. For example, appraisals for homes located in Boston are assigned to the New England office work queue. Which routing approach would you choose to support this requirement?

options.answer: Route the assignment based on appraiser skills.
Route the assignment based on an appraiser role.
It is not possible to support this requirement. The router must define a specific work queue.
Route the assignment to the correct work queue based on a decision rule.

questions.name: A hotel reservation application has the following requirement: Users must select the destination city from a list of options. The list is filtered on user entry. As a user types the city name, the list of options narrows. Which UI control allows you to implement this requirement?

options.answer: Drop-down
List to List
AutoComplete
Menu

questions.name: How do you configure an action set on a button to clear user selections and then review the previous actions on the case?

options.answer: First, configure a Click event with a Refresh action. Next, configure a Click event and a View History action.
First, configure a Click event with a View History action. Next, add a Refresh action to the event.
First, configure a Click event with a Refresh action. Next, add a View History action to the event.
First, configure a Click event with a Refresh action. Next, configure a Double-click event and a View History action.

questions.name: In a hotel reservation application, a form displays a list of hotels with available rooms based on the check-in and check-out dates entered by users. How do you configure the form to refresh the hotel list whenever the check-in or check-out date changes?

options.answer: Configure edit validates on the date fields to refresh the section when the date values change.
Configure an action set on the hotel list display to refresh the section when the hotel list changes.
Display the hotel in an embedded section with a visible when condition.
Configure action sets on the date fields to refresh the section when the date values change.

questions.name: In a Job Recruitment application, business needs to schedule interviews for candidates who meet passing requirements. Each interview must be tracked from interview date/time to resolution date/time for quality control purposes. The status of interview can change from New, Open-Scheduled, Open-InProgress, Resolved-Rejected, and Resolved-Approved. What are the new records are essential for this application? (Choose Three)

options.answer: A field for interview date/time.
A Wait shape to hold processing until interview is completed.
A case type.
A view to capture scheduling information.
A service level to ensure timely resolution.

questions.name: In an airline reservation application, users enter departure and return dates and submit for flight search. This is implemented as a flow action. You need to ensure that the return date is later than the departure date. You also need to copy the dates to a search parameter page that is used for flight search. Select the two rule types that the flow action references to satisfy these requirements. (Choose Two)

options.answer: Validate
Edit Validate
Service Level
Data Transform

questions.name: In an event reservation application, you are configuring a Select Flights view in which in which the user enters the destination (.Destination). Later in the life cycle, you want to display the destination value as the location (.Location) value in a Hotel Reservation view. How do you configure the data transform?

options.answer: Set .Destination as the target property equal to .Location as the source property.
Set .Location as the target property equal to .Destination as the source property.
Apply the pySetFieldDefault data transform to set the .Location property when the user enters the .Destination property value
Invoke a when condition to update the .Location property value when the user enters a .Destination property value.

questions.name: In a new hire process, a hiring manager needs to be automatically notified by email, when a job application case reaches a Collect Work Sample assignment. How would you configure this correspondence requirement?

options.answer: Add a SendCorrespondence local action to the assignment.
After the assignment, add a SendEmail SmartShape.
Enable assignment notifications for the case type.
Before the assignment, add a SendEmail SmartShape.

questions.name: In an mortgage application, the user creates a loan request. In order for the loan request to be approved, the loan officer must receive the results of an appraisal. How would you configure the case types to reflect their relationship?

options.answer: Make both loan request and appraisal peer case types.
Make loan request a parent case type, and appraisal a child case type.
Make mortgage a parent case type. Make loan request and appraisal child case types.
Make appraisal a parent case type, and loan request a child case type.

questions.name: In an online shopping application, the primary case type PurchaseOrder has two child case types: Payment and Packaging. In processing PurchaseOrder case PO-11, Payment case Pay-37 and Packaging case Pac-56 are created. Which statement about the processing of PO-11, Pay-37, and Pac-56 is correct?

options.answer: Pac-56 has to be resolved before Pay-37 is resolved.
PO-11 has to be resolved before either Pay-37 and Pac-56 is resolved.
Both Pay-37 and Pac-56 have to be resolved before PO-11 can be resolved.
PO-11 can be resolved when either Pay-37 or Pac-56 is resolved.

questions.name: You would like to use the Tracer tool to debug an error in your application. In which portal can you use the Tracer tool?

options.answer: Case Worker Portal
Case Manager Portal
Pega Express
Designer Studio

questions.name: In a purchase order application, you have been asked to add an order total field that is used on multiple forms in the application. You want to make sure that whenever the input values change, the order total will change in all the forms. Which two of the following reasons would you choose to use a declare expression rather than a data transform for calculating the value? (Choose Two)

options.answer: A declare expression updates the total value on all the forms when any form containing the field is submitted.
The system monitors input properties and determines when to update the target property value.
When updating a property that is calculated, you do not need to identify every calculation that updates any of the source values and manually re-calculate them.
A declare expression calculates a specific value that is used on multiple forms.

questions.name: An insurance company provides personal property insurance. Jewelry is categorized as a special type of personal property. Requests for jewelry coverage require that a user managing the request is trained to appraise jewelry. The requirement is to route assignments for jewelry appraisals to users who have this skill. Which one of the following routing approaches would you use?

options.answer: Route requests to a reporting manager who assigns the request to an available user to ensure fast processing.
Route requests to a work group that uses skill rating parameters for work group members.
Route directly to a user who is a member of work group that uses skill rating parameters.
Route requests to a decision table which routes the request to a work group in a location where there are users who have appraisal skills.

questions.name: An insurance company provides personal property insurance. Jewelry is categorized as a special type of personal property. Requests for jewelry coverage require that a user managing the request is trained to appraise jewelry. The requirement is to route assignments for jewelry appraisals to users who have this skill. Which one of the following routing approaches would you use?

options.answer: Route requests to a work group that uses skill rating parameters for work group members.
Route requests to a decision table which routes the request to a work group in a location where there are users who have appraisal skills.
Route requests to a reporting manager who assigns the request to an available user to ensure fast processing.
Route directly to a user who is a member of work group that uses skill rating parameters.

questions.name: In the event-action model of dynamic UI, which of the following statements is correct regarding event processing? (Choose One)

options.answer: An event can be configured to perform multiple actions.
A control always has one or more action sets.
An action can be performed for only one event per control.
Actions attached to an event execute in random order.

Copy data between pages

options.answer: A national insurance company requires a different minimum for liability coverage in each state.
A process does not execute if a user is not married.

An online order process optionally allows customers to update the credit card number saved with their account.

questions.name: In which two of the following situations would you use a data transform? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Create properties after the case has been created
Copy data from one page to another
Execute a flow action

options.answer: Drop-Down
Text field

Layout

questions.name: A list report includes columns for purchase requests and regional cost centers. A manager wants the report to show the total number of purchase requests for each of the regional cost centers. How would you configure the report definition?

options.answer: Filter the results so that only cost center and purchase requests are included in the report.
Use the purchase requests column to group the cost centers.
Summarize the purchase requests column by count.
Summarize the regional cost centers by count.

questions.name: A loans application requires a borrower data type with fields to collect first/last name, address, employment, income, credit score, etc. In certain situations data type of spouse/partner and/or cosigner are required. Can all data types reuse the same properties? (Choose One)

options.answer: Yes, if each data type references the same data class
Yes, if each field references the same data source
No, each data type must reference a unique data class
No, each data type must reference a unique data source

questions.name: A manager has requested a report that shows the purchase requests for each of the regional cost centers. The manager wants to organize the results so the cost center appears only once on the report and the requests are listed under cost center. How would you configure the report definition?

options.answer: Filter the results so that only cost center and requests are included in the report.
Use the requests column to group the results.
Summarize the requests column by count.
Use the cost center column to group the results

questions.name: A manager requests a report that contains the following columns: Create Date, Case ID, Create Operator, and Work Status. You must sort the Case ID values so the case with the highest ID value appears at the top of the list and descends in order. How would you design the report definition to support this requirement?

options.answer: For the Case ID property, select Highest to Lowest sort type.
Add a filter condition where Case ID is greater than one.
For the Case ID property, select Count in the Summarize column.
Make sure that the Case ID is the first column in the report.

questions.name: On which of the following would you find all of the test cases defined for an application and the status of each test case as of it's most recent execution. (Choose One)

options.answer: The Test Cases report definition
The PegaUnit Testing landing page
On the Test Cases tab of each rule form
The Automated Testing landing page

questions.name: You want to list the orders placed by a customer over the past six months. For each order, you need to display the order number, the date of the order, the total amount of the order, payment method, and order status in a series of columns. What type of layout do you use to present the list of orders to a user?

options.answer: A table
An inline-grid dynamic layout
An inline dynamic layout

Approval process

questions.name: You want to capture the delivery method for a purchase request. The options are: Standard, premium, or next-day. You use the Data Model tab to create the property. How would you define the list with the options?

options.answer: Picklist

questions.name: orm allows customers to specify the amount of a balance transfer for their credit card. The form contains two fields: one to display the available balance on the customer's credit card, and one for the user to enter the amount of the balance transfer. options.answer: From the property used to capture the amount of the balance transfer

questions.name: A parallel process is defined as ___________________________.

options.answer: a process that executes in the context of the current case
a process that is not part of the primary flow in the case life cycle
a process that executes in the context of another process
a process that executes over the same time period as other processes

questions.name: The primary purpose of a service level is to __________.

options.answer: help ensure timely completion of assignments
generate service level reports
assign cases to the appropriate case worker
track assignment status over time

questions.name: A process routes loan request to a specific loan officer based on the type of loan. -if the loan is a mortgage, it is routed to Adam ross -if the loan is for an automobile, it is  outed to Don Smith -if the loan is an equity line the case is routed to Don Smith How would you configure a router to ensure the case advances to the correct loan officer?

options.answer: Route the case to a workbasket that references a when condition
Route the case to a workbasket that references a when condition
Route the case to a worklist that references a when condition
Route the case to a worklist that references a decision table.

questions.name: pyWorkPage stores which type of information?

options.answer: Information about the current operator.
Data cached from an outside system.
Information about the Pega server.

questions.name: A report contains columns New Hire ID, New Hire Name, Start Date, and Location. The organization has offices in various cities throughout the U.S. A facilities manager requests a report that includes only new hires who are located in the Atlanta and Boston offices and have a start date within 30 days of the report date. How would you configure the filter to support this requirement?

options.answer: Create three conditions: Location equals Boston OR Location equals Atlanta AND Start Date equals 30 days.
RouteCreate three conditions: Location equals Boston OR Location equals Atlanta AND Start Date equals next 30 days.
Create one condition: Location equals Boston Atlanta, Start Date equals next 30 days.
Create three conditions: Location equals Boston AND location equals Atlanta AND Start Date equals next 30 days.

questions.name: A report contains five columns of data about sales quotes. The case ID (.pyID) The currently assigned sales representative (.pxAssignedOperatorID) The creation date of the sales quote (.pxCreateDate) The sales territory (.Territory) The expiration data of the quote (.ExpiryDate) Prior to property optimization, which two properties does the report identify as potentially impacting performance? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Sales territory (.Territory)
Creation date (.pxCreateDate)

questions.name: Select the statement that best describes an Edit Validate rule. (Choose One)

options.answer: Used to test property values against specific conditions
Used to ensure a required relationship between two properties

questions.name: Select the three true statements about the use of a BLOB field. (Choose Three)

A BLOB automatically exposes properties for reporting.

questions.name: Select the two items of information used to uniquely identify a rule. (Choose Two)

options.answer: The class of the rule.
The description of the rule.

questions.name: Your organization has a standard loan request report that contains columns for loan ID, loan officer, work status, and a loan creation date. A manager requests a report that includes only loans created in the previous quarter and do not have a status of New. How would you configure the report filter to support this requirement?

options.answer: Create two conditions: Work Status does not equal New, AND Creation Date is less than current quarter.
Create one condition: Work status does not equal New where Creation Date is equal to Previous Quarter.
Create two conditions: Work Status does not equal New, AND Creation Date is equal to Previous Quarter.
Create two conditions: Work Condition equals New OR Creation Date does not equal Previous Quarter.

options.answer: Review the current values of case data.

questions.name: The Tracer tool shows you a log of detailed information on your application. Select two methods you can use to limit the amount of information to the specific time when an error occurs. (Choose Two)

options.answer: Start the Tracer tool just prior to when the error occurs.
Clear the Tracer tool after the error occurs.

questions.name: Use data propagation to automatically copy values from a case to __________. (Choose One)

options.answer: subcases only
its parent case and any subcases
any cases

questions.name: The user enters a response on a form and clicks Submit. The Pega Platform application returns an error. Which tool can you use to determine the cause of the error in your application?

options.answer: Use the Live UI tool and search for the form that is causing the error.
Use the Tracer tool, search for the first FAIL status, and see which step is causing the error.

questions.name: A user must re-examine the contents of a new benefits enrollment before submission. The information should be displayed as read only. Which standard view should be used when implementing a solution for this requirement? (Choose One)

options.answer: Create
Edit
Custom
Review:

questions.name: Users are required to enter their date of birth in the format dd/mm/yyyy. Which two options ensure that a user provides a date in the correct format? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Use an Edit Validate rule to test the value entered by the user.
Use a Validate rule to test the value entered by the user.

questions.name: Users can access an apartment hunting application from different devices with different screen sizes. A screen displays the photos of available properties. By default, the photos are displayed in three columns. When the screen width is less than 800 pixels, the photos should be displayed in two columns. How do you implement the screen for this requirement?

options.answer: Use a dynamic layout with a responsive breakpoint at 800 pixels to change from inline-grid triple to inline-grid double format.
Circumstance the section rule to display different number of columns at different screen sizes.
Use a column layout with a responsive breakpoint at 800 pixels to hide the left column.
Circumstance the layout to display different number of columns at different screen sizes

questions.name: Users can access an apartment search application from different devices with different screen sizes. A screen displays the photos of available properties. On a wide desktop screen, the photos are displayed in an inline format. On a smart phone, the photos should be displayed in a vertical stack. How do you implement the screen for this requirement?

options.answer: Use a column layout with a responsive breakpoint at smart phone screen width to hide the left and right columns
Circumstance the section rule to display the photos with different arrangements at different screen sizes.
Circumstance the layout to display the photos the photos with different arrangements at different screen sizes.
Use a dynamic layout with a responsive breakpoint at smart phone screen width to change from an inline format to a stacked format.

questions.name: A user view is using a one (1) column template displaying available products from which the customer may choose one or many. The list slightly longer than the available space on the form. Using Pega Express, which approach should be used without changing font size? (Choose One)

options.answer: Select a different design template
Add another column using inline-grid double

questions.name: You are configuring a declarative network that contains eleven declare expressions which are used to calculate the interest rate for a home mortgage. For example, the target value Property Tax Assessment is used as a source value when calculating the Assessed Property Value. The declare expressions use target values from other expressions to calculate their target values. The field displaying the interest rate appears on the approval form. To improve performance, how can you reduce the number of calculations?

options.answer: Specify backward chaining in the total interest rate declare expression.
Specify forward chaining in the declare expression that calculates the total interest rate value.
Apply the declare expression in the approval flow action.
Calculate the total interest rate value by adding all the declare expression target property values

questions.name: You are configuring a declarative network that contains eleven declare expressions, which are used to calculate the interest rate for a home mortgage. For example, the target value Property Tax Assessment is used a source value when calculating the Assessed Property Value. The declare expressions use target values from other expressions to calculate their target values. The field displaying the interest rate appears on the approval form. To reduce the number of calculations in order to optimize performance, how would you configure the declare expressions? (Choose One)

options.answer: To calculate the total interest rate value, add the all the declare expression target property values.
Specify backward chaining in the total interest rate declare expression.
Apply the Declare Expression in the Approval Flow Action.
Specify forward chaining in the declare expression that calculates the total interest rate value.

questions.name: You are configuring a standard email to automatically be sent to loan applicants informing them that their loan has been approved. The requirement states that the email must include values for the applicant's name, the loan office, and the loan amount. The email must also include boilerplate content stating the loan's terms and conditions, which is regularly updated. This content is in a paragraph rule shared by other standard emails throughout the organization. How would you configure your email?

options.answer: Insert the applicant name and loan office properties. Include a correspondence fragment that contains a link to the organization's website page that contains loans and conditions.
Insert applicant's name, loan office, and loan amount properties. Also, insert the paragraph rule.
Insert applicant's name, loan office, and loan amount properties. Also, copy and paste the paragraph content into your email.
Add placeholder text for the applicant's name, loan office, and amount. Also, insert the paragraph rule.

The percentage of discount is calculated upon member check-out. Which of the following configuration options is best used to calculate the percentage of discount at time of purchase? (Choose One)

options.answer: Use procedural processing using when conditions to determine discount property value.
Use declarative processing using backward chaining in the purchase total declare expression.
Use procedural processing using a data transform to set the discount property value.
Use declarative processing using forward chaining to set the discount property value.

Total Cost of Options

questions.name: You check out a rule to update it. While the rule is checked out, another developer decides to test a case type by creating and processing the case. What happens when the application attempts to use the rule you checked out?

options.answer: The application ignores the checked-out version and uses the previous version in the application ruleset.
The application returns an error and stops processing the case, because the rule is unavailable for use.
The application runs the checked-out version of the rule, because that is the most up-to-date version of the rule.
The application cannot run because the rule is unavailable.

questions.name: You have a data page with customer data. The data page is configured to reload if it is older than one hour. Which of the following best describes when the data page will reload?

options.answer: The data page reloads automatically one hour after it was created.
The data page reloads automatically one hour after it was last accessed.
The data page reloads on the next access one hour after it was created.
The data page reloads on the next access one hour after it was last accessed.

questions.name: You have added an approval process assignment to a loan request process. The requirement states that a request can be routed to one or more managers for their approval. Te hierarchy of approvals depends upon the total dollar amount of the request. For example, Cost Center Managers approve requests that are less than USD 25,000. A request of greater than or equal to USD 25,000 requires the approval of the Cost Center Manager, corporate Vice President, and Vice President of Finance. How would you configure the routing for the approval process assignment?

options.answer: Configure a cascading approval flow type based on the reporting structure of the current user.
Configure a single level approval flow type based on an authority matrix.
Configure a single level approval flow type and route to a workbasket accessible by the approvers.
Configure a cascading approval flow type based on an authority matrix.

questions.name: You have added a page list property named Dependents to a view in the Case Designer. This page list contains the property .Relationship. Set .Dependents(1).Relationship to "Not Applicable"

a decision tree

questions.name: You have a requirement to add a bank checking account number field to a view. Routing numbers must contain nine digits. How would you configure the field to support this requirement?

options.answer: Use a decimal property type and make the field required.
Set the minimum and maximum values to 9 in a text field.
Use an edit validate rule that validates the routing number pattern.

questions.name: You have a requirement to add to a view a check box that indicates the user qualifies for an auto insurance discount. In order to qualify, two conditions must be met. First, the user must be older than 25. Second, the user cannot have received a traffic violation in the past three years. Unless both conditions are met and the user selects the check box, the form displays an error when the user submits the form. Which one of the following approaches would you use to support this requirement?

options.answer: Use an edit validate rule that validates both conditions.
Use two validate rules, one for each condition.
Associate an edit validate rule with the flow action that references the form.
Use a single validate rule to verify both of these conditions.

questions.name:
You have been asked to configure the following relationship between three case types: Account Open, Link Savings, and Fund Account:
1. A customer can complete an Account Open case before completing a Fund Account case. 
2. A customer must complete a Link Savings case before completing a Fund Account case.Which configuration satisfies this requirement?

options.answer: Configure the Account Open case type to create a Fund Account case as a top-level case. Configure the Account Open case type to create a Link Savings case as a child case.
Configure the Account Open case type to create a Fund Account case as a top-level case. Configure the Fund Account case type to create a Link Savings case as a child case.

Configure the Account Open case type to create the other cases as top-level cases. Add a validate rule to the Account Open case to require a resolved Link Savings case before the Fund Account case can be resolved.
Configure the Account Open case type to create a Fund Account case as a child case. Configure the Fund Account case type to create a Link Savings case as a top-level case.

questions.name: You have been asked to create a pie chart that shows the number of cases each manager has created. A list report contains columns for manager name, case ID, and office. How would you configure the list report in order to create the pie chart?

options.answer: Group the case ID column.
Group the manager name column.

Update the data page to change the data source information.
Update your application to remove any reference to the data page.
Wait until the data page reloads on the next access one hour after it was created.

questions.name: Using the correct control type for a specific purpose helps users enter valid values. Which is a example of this feature

questions.name: Using the correct control type for a specific purpose helps users enter valid values. Which is a example of this feature
questions.hint: Restrict choices to a set of valid values and allows users to select only one value. You can use radio buttons when only a small number of options (for example, fewer than five) is available.

options.answer: Users must select one of three possible loan types. The user must see all types on the form using radio button control.

questions.name: Using the correct control type for a specific purpose helps users enter valid values. Which is a example of this feature

entering office chair field using a text input control

questions.name: Using the correct control type for a specific purpose helps users enter valid values. Which is a example of this feature
questions.hint: When a user enters one or more values in the control, the control filters the available options. This helps users find an option in a list if there is a large number (for example, more than 20) of possible options.

options.answer: Users must select the country in which they reside from a list. The user can enter text in the control to help find the right country using autocomplete control.
entering country field using a text input control

questions.name: Using the correct control type for a specific purpose helps users enter valid values. Which is a example of this feature
questions.hint: The user can select the check box or leave it blank. This ensures that a true/false property is either true (selected) or false (unselected).

options.answer: Users select an option to purchase extra travel insurance using picklist control.
entering travel insurance field using a text input control

questions.name: In a user interface, user want to register himself. has a field for Date of Birth, selecting gender, enetring his name and want to agree on the terms and condition field

DOB should be handled by date only
selecting gender should be handled by picklist
terms and condition field should be a picklist

Name should be handled by date only

terms and condition field should be a Boolean

questions.name: In an application, the gender field is having a text control. User would like to see this field as a picklist (radio button or dropdown).

options.answer: the layout which uses the field should be using the radio control in property panel
modify the text control rule
Modify the property rule to accomodate this
the layout which uses the field should be using the dropdown control in property panel

questions.name: How to configure a field in which a user selects one of four possible shipping methods?

options.answer: use a picklist field and specify either a radio button or dropdown control type.
use a text field and specify either a radio button or dropdown control type.

You can configure required fields when working with sections in Designer Studio.

select Condition (expression) from Visibility dropdown

selecet Condition (when rule) from Required dropdown

questions.name: How to configure a field as a required field conditionally.

from designer studio this is possible

it is not possible to do at all

questions.name: How to configure a input field to be always ReadOnly

options.answer: configure the input property or field

it is suggested to modify control rule.

questions.name: How to configure a input field to be always editable

options.answer: configure the input property or field

questions.name: ABC corp is having an online shopping application. In the bill page, when user updates an item quantity, the billing amount and total billing amount should be updated too. Select which one is least appropriate.

options.answer: run an activity on change of the quantity to update the billing amount and total billing amount
configure a declare onchange rule on the quantity to update the billing amount and total billing amount
configure two declare expression for Billing amount and another for Total Billing amount
configure a declare expression rule for only Billing amount

questions.name: ABC corp is having an online shopping application. In the bill review page, total billing amount should be shown. Which declarative chaining method is appropriate?

options.answer: forward chaining
backward chaining

questions.name: ABC corp is having an online shopping application. In all the page, when user updates an item quantity, the billing amount and total billing amount should be updated suitably. Which declarative chaining method is appropriate?

options.answer: forward chaining
backward chaining

questions.name: ABC corp is having an online shopping application. In item selection page, user selects one laptop for 800$. There is a declare expression which uses quantity as a input property and Bill amount as Target property. There is one more declara expression, which uses Bill amount as input property and Total bill amount as target property. After selecting one laptop, user click next. Now when the declare expression would be triggered considering that the Bill amount displays besides the laptop when user changes the quantity.

options.answer: Both declare expression will trigger at first page
Both declare expression will trigger at first page
Bill amount declare expression will trigger at first page and total bill amount declare expression will after user submission
Total Bill amount declare expression will trigger at first page and bill amount declare expression will after user submission

questions.name: ABC corp is having an online shopping application. On billing page, user can apply a promo code in promo code text box. If user provides a promocode, on change event of promocode triggers an activity to refresh the total bill amount.

options.answer: This is procedural processing
This is declarative processing
This is neither declarative nor procedural
This is computative processing

options.answer: true
false

questions.name: ABC corp is having an online shopping application. On billing page as well as on review order page, user can update quantity of item. user is calling a data transform in billing page to update the total amount. Once user submits the billing page, review order page appears. If user is completely relying on procedural processing, which scenario is supposed to be true.

options.answer: Same data transform should be added to the Review Order page to update the Total order amount when the user changes the order quantity from 2 to 3.
No need of any extra functionality to add on the onchange of quantity field. Adding the functionality on billing page is enough.
User cannot achieve this functionality by only using procedural logic
None of the above

questions.name: ABC corp is having an online shopping application. On billing page as well as on review order page, user can update quantity of item. If user is completely relying on declarative processing, which scenario is supposed to be true.

options.answer: New data transform should be added to the Review Order page to update the Total order amount when the user changes the order quantity from 2 to 3.

scrap declare expression and replace the logic with a procedural logic.

questions.name: ABC Corporation is using a forward chaining home insurance quote based on more than 10 property values such as location, tax assessment, appraisal value, and land area. These values are collected in many different forms. Select which is not applicable.

options.answer: Forward chaining can slow system performance
Forward chaining is better than backward chaining in this scenario to calculate the home insurance quote value
target property will be calculated using declare expression whenever any of it`s input property changes
The impact to performance might affect response time when the user enters values or submits forms.

options.answer: Forward chaining can slow system performance

options.answer: backward chaining
foreward chaining

questions.name: ABC corp is showing the insurance quote at the end of the screen which need to be computed by 10 input propertues which would be collected before reaching to this final screen. Please suggest which chaining would be suitable to implement this.

options.answer: forward chaining is not good as the system performs the calculation even if the user does not see or need the value
backward chaining is good as the property is needed at last screen and will be shown

questions.name: You are designing a travel plan application. A hotel booking step displays a form in which users select a hotel and enter the number of days they are staying at the hotel. The form displays the total cost for the hotel room. The form also includes fields for selecting, at extra cost, options such as valet parking. The application totals the cost for any selected options and adds that amount to the total room cost  to equal the grand total, which is displayed in a field. Which two of the following properties would you use as the target properties? (Choose Two)

options.answer: Price of each option
Total cost for the hotel room
Total cost of options
Number of days at the hotel

questions.name: In a purchase order application, you have been asked to add an order total field that is used on multiple forms in the application. You want to make sure that whenever the input values change, the order total will change in all the forms. Which two of the following reasons would you choose to use a declare expression rather than a data transform for calculating the value? (Choose Two)

options.answer: the system monitors input properties and determines when to update the target property value.
A declare expression updates the total value on all the forms when any form containing the field is submitted.
A declare expression calculates a specific value that is used on multiple forms.
When updating a property that is calculated, you do not need to identify every calculation that updates any of the source values and manually re-calculate them.

questions.name: You are configuring a declarative network that contains eleven declare expressions which are used to calculate the interest rate for a home mortgage. For example, the target value Property Tax Assessment is used as a source value when calculating the Assessed Property Value. The declare expressions use target values from other expressions to calculate their target values. The field displaying the interest rate appears on the approval form. To improve performance, how can you reduce the number of calculations?

options.answer: Specify forward chaining in the declare expression that calculates the total interest rate value.
Calculate the total interest rate value by adding all the declare expression target property values.
Specify backward chaining in the total interest rate declare expression.
Apply the declare expression in the approval flow action.
